name: 2 - 6 - 1.6 Text Representation- Part 2 (00-09-29).srt
text: [SOUND].

name: 2 - 6 - 1.6 Text Representation- Part 2 (00-09-29).srt
text: _So
column6: as we explained the different text _

name: 2 - 6 - 1.6 Text Representation- Part 2 (00-09-29).srt
text: representation tends to enable different analysis.

name: 2 - 6 - 1.6 Text Representation- Part 2 (00-09-29).srt
text: _In particular
column6: we can gradually add more and _

name: 2 - 6 - 1.6 Text Representation- Part 2 (00-09-29).srt
text: more deeper analysis results to represent text data.

name: 2 - 6 - 1.6 Text Representation- Part 2 (00-09-29).srt
text: And that would open up a more interesting representation

name: 2 - 6 - 1.6 Text Representation- Part 2 (00-09-29).srt
text: opportunities and also analysis capacities.

name: 2 - 6 - 1.6 Text Representation- Part 2 (00-09-29).srt
text: _So
column6: this table summarizes what we have just seen. _

name: 2 - 6 - 1.6 Text Representation- Part 2 (00-09-29).srt
text: So the first column shows the text representation.

name: 2 - 6 - 1.6 Text Representation- Part 2 (00-09-29).srt
text: The second visualizes the generality of such a representation.

name: 2 - 6 - 1.6 Text Representation- Part 2 (00-09-29).srt
text: Meaning whether we can do this kind of representation accurately for

name: 2 - 6 - 1.6 Text Representation- Part 2 (00-09-29).srt
text: all the text data or only some of them.

name: 2 - 6 - 1.6 Text Representation- Part 2 (00-09-29).srt
text: And the third column shows the enabled analysis techniques.

name: 2 - 6 - 1.6 Text Representation- Part 2 (00-09-29).srt
text: And the final column shows some examples of application that

name: 2 - 6 - 1.6 Text Representation- Part 2 (00-09-29).srt
text: can be achieved through this level of representation.

name: 2 - 6 - 1.6 Text Representation- Part 2 (00-09-29).srt
text: So let's take a look at them.

name: 2 - 6 - 1.6 Text Representation- Part 2 (00-09-29).srt
text: So as a stream text can only be processed by stream processing algorithms.

name: 2 - 6 - 1.6 Text Representation- Part 2 (00-09-29).srt
text: _It's very robust
column6: it's general. _

name: 2 - 6 - 1.6 Text Representation- Part 2 (00-09-29).srt
text: And there was still some interesting applications that can be down

name: 2 - 6 - 1.6 Text Representation- Part 2 (00-09-29).srt
text: at this level.

name: 2 - 6 - 1.6 Text Representation- Part 2 (00-09-29).srt
text: _For example
column6: compression of text. _

name: 2 - 6 - 1.6 Text Representation- Part 2 (00-09-29).srt
text: Doesn't necessarily need to know the word boundaries.

name: 2 - 6 - 1.6 Text Representation- Part 2 (00-09-29).srt
text: Although knowing word boundaries might actually also help.

name: 2 - 6 - 1.6 Text Representation- Part 2 (00-09-29).srt
text: Word base repetition is a very important level of representation.

name: 2 - 6 - 1.6 Text Representation- Part 2 (00-09-29).srt
text: It's quite general and

name: 2 - 6 - 1.6 Text Representation- Part 2 (00-09-29).srt
text: _relatively robust
column6: indicating they were a lot of analysis techniques. _

name: 2 - 6 - 1.6 Text Representation- Part 2 (00-09-29).srt
text: _Such as word relation analysis
column6: topic analysis and sentiment analysis. _

name: 2 - 6 - 1.6 Text Representation- Part 2 (00-09-29).srt
text: And there are many applications that can be enabled by this kind of analysis.

name: 2 - 6 - 1.6 Text Representation- Part 2 (00-09-29).srt
text: _For example
column6: thesaurus discovery has to do with discovering related words. _

name: 2 - 6 - 1.6 Text Representation- Part 2 (00-09-29).srt
text: And topic and opinion related applications are abounded.

name: 2 - 6 - 1.6 Text Representation- Part 2 (00-09-29).srt
text: _And there are
column6: for example

name: 2 - 6 - 1.6 Text Representation- Part 2 (00-09-29).srt
text: might be interesting in knowing the major topics covered in the collection of texts.

name: 2 - 6 - 1.6 Text Representation- Part 2 (00-09-29).srt
text: And this can be the case in research literature.

name: 2 - 6 - 1.6 Text Representation- Part 2 (00-09-29).srt
text: And scientists want to know what are the most important research topics today.

name: 2 - 6 - 1.6 Text Representation- Part 2 (00-09-29).srt
text: Or customer service people might want to know all our major complaints from their

name: 2 - 6 - 1.6 Text Representation- Part 2 (00-09-29).srt
text: customers by mining their e-mail messages.

name: 2 - 6 - 1.6 Text Representation- Part 2 (00-09-29).srt
text: And business intelligence people might be interested in

name: 2 - 6 - 1.6 Text Representation- Part 2 (00-09-29).srt
text: understanding consumers' opinions about their products and the competitors'

name: 2 - 6 - 1.6 Text Representation- Part 2 (00-09-29).srt
text: products to figure out what are the winning features of their products.

name: 2 - 6 - 1.6 Text Representation- Part 2 (00-09-29).srt
text: _And
column6: in general

name: 2 - 6 - 1.6 Text Representation- Part 2 (00-09-29).srt
text: applications that can be enabled by the representation at this level.

name: 2 - 6 - 1.6 Text Representation- Part 2 (00-09-29).srt
text: _Now
column6: moving down
column7: we'll see we can gradually add additional representations. _

name: 2 - 6 - 1.6 Text Representation- Part 2 (00-09-29).srt
text: _By adding syntactical structures
column6: we can enable

name: 2 - 6 - 1.6 Text Representation- Part 2 (00-09-29).srt
text: syntactical graph analysis.

name: 2 - 6 - 1.6 Text Representation- Part 2 (00-09-29).srt
text: We can use graph mining algorithms to analyze syntactic graphs.

name: 2 - 6 - 1.6 Text Representation- Part 2 (00-09-29).srt
text: And some applications are related to this kind of representation.

name: 2 - 6 - 1.6 Text Representation- Part 2 (00-09-29).srt
text: _For example

name: 2 - 6 - 1.6 Text Representation- Part 2 (00-09-29).srt
text: stylistic analysis generally requires syntactical structure representation.

name: 2 - 6 - 1.6 Text Representation- Part 2 (00-09-29).srt
text: We can also generate the structure based features.

name: 2 - 6 - 1.6 Text Representation- Part 2 (00-09-29).srt
text: And those are features that might help us classify the text objects into different

name: 2 - 6 - 1.6 Text Representation- Part 2 (00-09-29).srt
text: categories by looking at the structures sometimes in the classification.

name: 2 - 6 - 1.6 Text Representation- Part 2 (00-09-29).srt
text: It can be more accurate.

name: 2 - 6 - 1.6 Text Representation- Part 2 (00-09-29).srt
text: _For example
column6: if you want to classify articles into _

name: 2 - 6 - 1.6 Text Representation- Part 2 (00-09-29).srt
text: different categories corresponding to different authors.

name: 2 - 6 - 1.6 Text Representation- Part 2 (00-09-29).srt
text: You want to figure out which of the k authors has actually written

name: 2 - 6 - 1.6 Text Representation- Part 2 (00-09-29).srt
text: _this article
column6: then you generally need to look at the syntactic structures. _

name: 2 - 6 - 1.6 Text Representation- Part 2 (00-09-29).srt
text: _When we add entities and relations

name: 2 - 6 - 1.6 Text Representation- Part 2 (00-09-29).srt
text: then we can enable other techniques such as knowledge graph and

name: 2 - 6 - 1.6 Text Representation- Part 2 (00-09-29).srt
text: _answers
column6: or information network and answers in general. _

name: 2 - 6 - 1.6 Text Representation- Part 2 (00-09-29).srt
text: And this analysis enable applications about entities.

name: 2 - 6 - 1.6 Text Representation- Part 2 (00-09-29).srt
text: _For example

name: 2 - 6 - 1.6 Text Representation- Part 2 (00-09-29).srt
text: discovery of all the knowledge and opinions about real world entities.

name: 2 - 6 - 1.6 Text Representation- Part 2 (00-09-29).srt
text: You can also use this level representation

name: 2 - 6 - 1.6 Text Representation- Part 2 (00-09-29).srt
text: to integrate everything about anything from scaled resources.

name: 2 - 6 - 1.6 Text Representation- Part 2 (00-09-29).srt
text: _Finally
column6: when we add logical predicates

name: 2 - 6 - 1.6 Text Representation- Part 2 (00-09-29).srt
text: _that would enable large inference
column6: of course. _

name: 2 - 6 - 1.6 Text Representation- Part 2 (00-09-29).srt
text: And this can be very useful for

name: 2 - 6 - 1.6 Text Representation- Part 2 (00-09-29).srt
text: integrating analysis of scattered knowledge.

name: 2 - 6 - 1.6 Text Representation- Part 2 (00-09-29).srt
text: _For example
column6: we can also add ontology on top of the

name: 2 - 6 - 1.6 Text Representation- Part 2 (00-09-29).srt
text: _extracted the information from text
column6: to make inferences. _

name: 2 - 6 - 1.6 Text Representation- Part 2 (00-09-29).srt
text: _A good of example of application in this enabled by this level of representation

name: 2 - 6 - 1.6 Text Representation- Part 2 (00-09-29).srt
text: is a knowledge assistant for biologists.

name: 2 - 6 - 1.6 Text Representation- Part 2 (00-09-29).srt
text: And this program that can help a biologist manage all the relevant knowledge from

name: 2 - 6 - 1.6 Text Representation- Part 2 (00-09-29).srt
text: literature about a research problem such as understanding functions of genes.

name: 2 - 6 - 1.6 Text Representation- Part 2 (00-09-29).srt
text: And the computer can make inferences

name: 2 - 6 - 1.6 Text Representation- Part 2 (00-09-29).srt
text: about some of the hypothesis that the biologist might be interesting.

name: 2 - 6 - 1.6 Text Representation- Part 2 (00-09-29).srt
text: _For example
column6: whether a gene has a certain function

name: 2 - 6 - 1.6 Text Representation- Part 2 (00-09-29).srt
text: _then the intelligent program can read the literature to extract the relevant facts

name: 2 - 6 - 1.6 Text Representation- Part 2 (00-09-29).srt
text: doing compiling and information extracting.

name: 2 - 6 - 1.6 Text Representation- Part 2 (00-09-29).srt
text: And then using a logic system to actually track that's the answers

name: 2 - 6 - 1.6 Text Representation- Part 2 (00-09-29).srt
text: to researchers questioning about what genes are related to what functions.

name: 2 - 6 - 1.6 Text Representation- Part 2 (00-09-29).srt
text: So in order to support this level of application

name: 2 - 6 - 1.6 Text Representation- Part 2 (00-09-29).srt
text: we need to go as far as logical representation.

name: 2 - 6 - 1.6 Text Representation- Part 2 (00-09-29).srt
text: _Now
column6: this course is covering techniques mainly based on word based representation. _

name: 2 - 6 - 1.6 Text Representation- Part 2 (00-09-29).srt
text: And these techniques are general and

name: 2 - 6 - 1.6 Text Representation- Part 2 (00-09-29).srt
text: robust and that's more widely used in various applications.

name: 2 - 6 - 1.6 Text Representation- Part 2 (00-09-29).srt
text: _In fact
column6: in virtually all the text mining applications you need this level of _

name: 2 - 6 - 1.6 Text Representation- Part 2 (00-09-29).srt
text: representation and then techniques that support analysis of text in this level.

name: 2 - 6 - 1.6 Text Representation- Part 2 (00-09-29).srt
text: But obviously all these other levels can be combined and

name: 2 - 6 - 1.6 Text Representation- Part 2 (00-09-29).srt
text: should be combined in order to support the sophisticated applications.

name: 2 - 6 - 1.6 Text Representation- Part 2 (00-09-29).srt
text: _So to summarize
column6: here are the major takeaway points. _

name: 2 - 6 - 1.6 Text Representation- Part 2 (00-09-29).srt
text: Text representation determines what kind of mining algorithms can be applied.

name: 2 - 6 - 1.6 Text Representation- Part 2 (00-09-29).srt
text: _And there are multiple ways to represent the text
column6: strings

name: 2 - 6 - 1.6 Text Representation- Part 2 (00-09-29).srt
text: _syntactic structures
column6: entity-relation graphs

name: 2 - 6 - 1.6 Text Representation- Part 2 (00-09-29).srt
text: And these different representations should in general

name: 2 - 6 - 1.6 Text Representation- Part 2 (00-09-29).srt
text: be combined in real applications to the extent we can.

name: 2 - 6 - 1.6 Text Representation- Part 2 (00-09-29).srt
text: _For example
column6: even if we cannot do accurate representations _

name: 2 - 6 - 1.6 Text Representation- Part 2 (00-09-29).srt
text: _of syntactic structures
column6: we can state that partial structures strictly. _

name: 2 - 6 - 1.6 Text Representation- Part 2 (00-09-29).srt
text: _And if we can recognize some entities
column6: that would be great. _

name: 2 - 6 - 1.6 Text Representation- Part 2 (00-09-29).srt
text: So in general we want to do as much as we can.

name: 2 - 6 - 1.6 Text Representation- Part 2 (00-09-29).srt
text: _And when different levels are combined together

name: 2 - 6 - 1.6 Text Representation- Part 2 (00-09-29).srt
text: _we can enable a richer analysis
column6: more powerful analysis. _

name: 2 - 6 - 1.6 Text Representation- Part 2 (00-09-29).srt
text: This course however focuses on word-based representation.

name: 2 - 6 - 1.6 Text Representation- Part 2 (00-09-29).srt
text: _Such techniques have also several advantage
column6: first of they are general and _

name: 2 - 6 - 1.6 Text Representation- Part 2 (00-09-29).srt
text: _robust
column6: so they are applicable to any natural language. _

name: 2 - 6 - 1.6 Text Representation- Part 2 (00-09-29).srt
text: That's a big advantage over other approaches that rely on

name: 2 - 6 - 1.6 Text Representation- Part 2 (00-09-29).srt
text: more fragile natural language processing techniques.

name: 2 - 6 - 1.6 Text Representation- Part 2 (00-09-29).srt
text: _Secondly
column6: it does not require much manual effort

name: 2 - 6 - 1.6 Text Representation- Part 2 (00-09-29).srt
text: _sometimes
column6: it does not require any manual effort. _

name: 2 - 6 - 1.6 Text Representation- Part 2 (00-09-29).srt
text: _So that's
column6: again

name: 2 - 6 - 1.6 Text Representation- Part 2 (00-09-29).srt
text: because that means that you can apply it directly to any application.

name: 2 - 6 - 1.6 Text Representation- Part 2 (00-09-29).srt
text: _Third
column6: these techniques are actually surprisingly powerful and _

name: 2 - 6 - 1.6 Text Representation- Part 2 (00-09-29).srt
text: effective form in implications.

name: 2 - 6 - 1.6 Text Representation- Part 2 (00-09-29).srt
text: Although not all of course as I just explained.

name: 2 - 6 - 1.6 Text Representation- Part 2 (00-09-29).srt
text: Now they are very effective partly because the words

name: 2 - 6 - 1.6 Text Representation- Part 2 (00-09-29).srt
text: are invented by humans as basically units for communications.

name: 2 - 6 - 1.6 Text Representation- Part 2 (00-09-29).srt
text: So they are actually quite sufficient for representing all kinds of semantics.

name: 2 - 6 - 1.6 Text Representation- Part 2 (00-09-29).srt
text: So that makes this kind of word-based representation all so powerful.

name: 2 - 6 - 1.6 Text Representation- Part 2 (00-09-29).srt
text: _And finally
column6: such a word-based representation and the techniques enable _

name: 2 - 6 - 1.6 Text Representation- Part 2 (00-09-29).srt
text: by such a representation can be combined with many other sophisticated approaches.

name: 2 - 6 - 1.6 Text Representation- Part 2 (00-09-29).srt
text: So they're not competing with each other.

name: 2 - 6 - 1.6 Text Representation- Part 2 (00-09-29).srt
text: [MUSIC]
